alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; East Platte County; Goshen County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 31 at 1:34PM MST until January 02 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM SUNDAY TO 11 PM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 10 inches. Localized areas of 12+ inches possible with heavy banding. * WHERE...Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County, East Platte County and Goshen County. * WHEN...From 5 AM Sunday to 11 PM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Dangerous travel conditions due to icy, snow packed roads and significantly reduced visibilities in falling and blowing snow.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; East Platte County; Goshen County
